name: Competitive Gaming Simulator
description:
Want to experience playing a competitive game without any of the actual stress and toxicity? Well good luck with that. But here's a shallow simulator of it instead.

This game was made for a personal 24-hour challenge. Total project time: 3 day 6~ hours, over the course of 7 days...

As you can tell this project took much longer than I had originally intended. But this being my very first project that I had ever finished it was only to be expected. In the end however, I can't help but feel accomplished all the same. The game may have several more bugs that I didn't find, the gameplay will probably be the most boring thing you've touched this week. But it's finished.

I hope that in the weeks and months to come I can continue to ride this momentum and release many more games with increasing quality and skill.

If you spent any amount of time playing or reading this, hi there how's it going?
